<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#14711](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/14711.html) (Remove uses of chainActive and mapBlockInde

Note: Travis and AppVeyor fail due to seemingly unrelated issues:\nhttps://ci.appveyor.com/project/DrahtBot/bitcoin/build/master.1848?fullLog=true\nhttps://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/435323308
Not sure what this is fixing. ~~NACK.~~
Updated the PR's description to contain more information about the issues it fixes.\nShould I split it into separate commits?
Also, I'm not sure how to test it (other than manually running `bitcoind` and inspecting the logs)...

How about this one:
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/1e8f88e071019907785b260477bd359bef6f9a8f/src/validation.cpp#L2312

This only benefits the human eye as the durations can be extracted either way. Consistency is a plus though.

Retracted from NACK to -0.
Good suggestion!\nWill update the PR in the following days.

I have updated (most) the benchmarking-related code in this PR to be consistent with the format used at [src/validation.cpp](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/1e8f88e071019907785b260477bd359bef6f9a8f/src/validation.cpp#L2312), except the code at [src/wallet/wallet.cpp](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14358/files#diff-b2bb174788c7409b671c46ccc86034bd) (since it uses [CWallet::WalletLo
Updated the PR to use the original logging categories.
@promag Please let me know if there is a problem with this PR.
@romanz I didn't meant to change the log category. I think some of these messages must/should be present in the log regardless of the enabled logging categories.

Sounds good, I'll switch back to using `LogPrintf()`.

Just a small question: are the new log messages fine? 
If not, please let me know so I would fix them :)
